short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromepet pulls up source code of any Website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chromepet is an open source extension which can pull source code of any webpage through it's small icon listed at the toolbar of the browser.

The project is open sourced with MIT License (Please find details of the license below) and has been hosted in a public repository at Github. 

Link to the Github repository: https://github.com/thedhanawada/Chromepet

Please give the extension a try and give me your feedback on how to improve it. Any contributions to the project is welcome. 

Icon Attribution
Icons made by Vitaly Gorbachev from Flaticon
